text:
01 of 235 DIANE KRUGER Gisela Schober/Getty The festival's best actress winner proved she's also a red carpet winner in this stunning sheer design featuring polka dots and florals by Jason Wu at the In the Fade premiere. Soft pulled-back waves, Chopard jewels and two-strap black heels finished the look.

02 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN Gisela Schober/Getty The jury member closed out the festival in a white cap-sleeve gown with red embellishments and an asymmetrical hem by Zuhair Murad for the Closing Ceremony. Old Hollywood waves, a bold red lip, diamond earrings and platform red heels finished out the glam look.

03 of 235 UMA THURMAN Venturelli/WireImage The jury member closed out the festival with a wow-worthy gold fringe gown by Atelier Versace and a blunt lob for the Closing Ceremony red carpet.

04 of 235 EVA GREEN Canio Romaniello/SilverHub/REX/Shutterstock In an Alexander McQueen corseted see-through gray, silver and black gown with fringe embellishment at the Based On A True Story premiere.

05 of 235 JULIETTE BINOCHE Gisela Schober/Getty The actress chose a perfectly-tailored one-shoulder sequin black gown by Armani Privé for the Closing Ceremony of the festival. She paired the look with a classic updo and a diamond bangle.

06 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN Manuele Mangiarotti/SilverHu/REX/Shutterstock The jury member rocked a gold and white cap-sleeve gown by Chanel -- it was also backless! -- and chic updo at the In the Fade premiere.

07 of 235 UMA THURMAN AFP/Getty The jury member of the fest attended the Un Certain Regard prize ceremony in chic separates, including a blazer, button-down shirt and pants combination, which she paired with a bold floral necklace and black sandals.

08 of 235 KAROLINA KURKOVA Venturelli/WireImage The model showed off a new take on the LBD in a high-low strapless design, which she paired with a bold Chopard diamond choker and ankle-strap black sandals at the Based On A True Story premiere.

09 of 235 JULIETTE BINOCHE Andreas Rentz/Getty The actress wore a V-neck white gown with black detailing and Chopard diamond jewels to the Tribute to Christopher Doyle at the Cannes Film Festival.

10 of 235 IZABEL GOULART Venturelli/WireImage The model worked the L'Amant Double premiere in a nude-hued gown covered in crystal embellishments by Zuhair Murad Couture and Chopard earrings.

11 of 235 ROONEY MARA Neilson Barnard/Getty The low-key actress kept her clear-framed sunnies on for her walk down the red carpet for the closing ceremony of the Cannes Film Festival in a white lace Dior midi, which she paired with a black clutch and black pumps.

12 of 235 DIANE KRUGER Pierre Suu/GC Images The festival's Best Actress winner chose an off-the-shoulder black gown -- made custom for her by Jonathan Simkhai --with a silver clutch and a Chopard diamond necklace at the Closing Ceremony of the festival.

13 of 235 BELLA HADID Kevin Tachman/Getty The model not only walked the runway during the auction fashion show at the gala, but she also popped bottles right on the catwalk. (Seriously! For more outtakes from her best night ever click here.)

14 of 235 IRINA SHAYK Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty Irina proves she's not only a supermodel but a superhuman, hitting the amfAR catwalk just nine weeks after giving birth to her first child — daughter Lea De Seine— with actor Bradley Cooper.

15 of 235 BELLA HADID AND CARINE ROITFELD Pascal Le Segretain/amfAR2017/French Select for amfAR Seen here in her third gown of the evening, Bella poses with legendary fashion editor Carine Roitfeld, who curated the dresses for the amfAR runway show.

16 of 235 IRINA SHAYK, BELLA HADID AND HAILEY BALDWIN Dave Benett/WireImage The model trifecta has a toast during the onstage auction at the amfAR gala.

17 of 235 HAILEY CLAUSON Kevin Tachman/Getty The Sports Illustrated swimsuit model takes the runway by storm in her low-cut sequin gown (which was almost as revealing as the J. Mendel gown she wore on the red carpet).

18 of 235 MODEL MONEY MAKERS Dominique Charriau/Getty The entire collection of dresses the models wore during the runway show were auctioned off for 3 million euros, which is approximately $3.36 million.

19 of 235 NICKI MINAJ Dave Benett/WireImage Because one outfit is never enough, Nicki changed into a equally sexy, skin-baring red sequin gown while inside the gala, but kept her knee-length hair exactly the same.

20 of 235 SQUAD Dave Benett/amfAR2017/Dave Benett/WireImage for amfAR Cindy Bruna, Winnie Harlow, Nicki Minaj and Joan Smalls serve up some supermodel smizes inside the gala.

21 of 235 NICKI MINAJ Nicki Minaj. David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock brings the sex appeal in a deep-V Roberto Cavalli Couture evening gown in black lace patchwork with ruffles, plus embroidered floral designs in black crystals and glass beads.

22 of 235 NICOLE KIDMAN Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock brings her style A-Game once again in a Chanel Couture dress with a feathered skirt and sequin bodice at the amfAR gala.

23 of 235 BELLA HADID Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock After traveling to Rome with Bulgari, Bella returns to Cannes for the amfAR gala and clearly saves her sexiest gown for last in this sheer Ralph & Russo Couture design embroidered with crystals, glass beads and silver chain.

24 of 235 TRACEE ELLIS ROSS Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock channels her mom Diana Ross in a red sequin Jenny Packham with voluminous feather sleeves at amfAR.

25 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock in a elegant black Prada gown plus a pearl-and-diamond tassel necklace at amfAR.

26 of 235 UMA THURMAN Andreas Rentz/French Select/Getty in a gold glittering skirt teamed with a white button-down menswear-inspired shirt and matching tie at amfAR.

27 of 235 IRINA SHAYK Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock The new mom keeps the glam gowns coming, stepping out at the amfAR Gala in a silver Prada gown covered in oversize paillettes.

28 of 235 DIANE KRUGER Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock The actress skips the dramatic gown in favor of a sexy wide-leg black jumpsuit with ab cutouts.

29 of 235 PARIS HILTON David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock says she feels like a “sparkling diamond” in her glittering Yousef Al-Jasmi beaded gown worn to the amfAR Gala.

30 of 235 LINDSAY LOHAN Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock in a black-and-white ball gown with delicate beading and a diamond choker at amfAR.

31 of 235 EVA LONGORIA David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock caps off her Cannes parade in a pink sequin Elia Saab gown with a star burst print, plus Damiani jewelry.

32 of 235 DIONNE WARWICK Andreas Rentz/French Select for amfAR looks iconic in her blue-and-white waterclor gown with a matching shawl.

33 of 235 HAILEY BALDWIN David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock goes for high drama in a burgundy Elie Saab velvet-and-tulle gown teamed with Lorraine Schwartz jewelry at the amfAR gala.

34 of 235 PETRA NEMCOVA Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock in a seafoam, high-slit ruffle embellished gown plus metallic heels and diamond jewels.

35 of 235 JASMINE TOOKES Andreas Rentz/French Select for amfAR/Getty in a black Zuhair Murad gown, Casadei heels and Bulgari jewelry.

36 of 235 NATASHA POLY Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock goes nude in a skin-color gown teamed with a ruby and diamond collar necklace and lace-up gold heels.

37 of 235 MARIA BORGES ALBERTO PIZZOLI/AFP/Getty in a sleek white Carolina Herrera dress, metallic sandals and a collar necklace.

38 of 235 WINNIE HARLOW David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock dares to bare her underwear in a completely sheer white embroidered gown teamed with a new pixie hairstyle.

39 of 235 SOFIA RICHIE Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock in a black sheer feathered gown that leaves little to the imagination, plus a yellow top-handle bag and Coomi jewels at amfAR.

40 of 235 ELSA HOSK Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock in a pink strapless lace dress with a corset bodice and statement earrings.

41 of 235 ANJA RUBIK ALBERTO PIZZOLI/AFP/Getty in a black sequin Anthony Vaccarello minidress with big shoulders and a deep plunge at amfAR.

42 of 235 SHANINA SHAIK Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock dares to bare (a lot of side boob) in a silver mesh Philipp Plein gown and Lorrine

43 of 235 KAROLINA KURKOVA Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock in a sheer, strapless feather Marchesa gown with sequin accents and a purple sash at amfAR.

44 of 235 JOAN SMALLS Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock in a blue Elie Saab Haute Couture design worn with a bejeweled harness and gold sandals at amfAR.

45 of 235 BARBARA PALVIN Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock goes for a princessy Prada ball gown in her pink strapless design with a structured bodice teamed with Messika jewels at amfAR.

46 of 235 COCO ROCHA Andreas Rentz/French Select/Getty debuts a dark new hair color in a strapless black gown with a statement tulle train, plus a huge statement necklace at the amfAR gala.

47 of 235 DOUTZEN KROES David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock is one red hot mom in her bespoke asymmetric pleated floor length Boss gown featuring a thigh-high slit and slash cutout on the bodice at amfAR.

48 of 235 ANDREJA PEJIC Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstoc wears a vintage Dolce & Gabbana lace-up dress, matching purse, John Hardy jewelry and gold strappy heels to the amfAR gala.

49 of 235 MELISSA GEORGE David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock wears a strapless Schiaparelli Couture gown with a gold bodice and black lace skirt, plus a soft updo at amfAR.

50 of 235 KATE UPTON David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock wears a nude fringe skirt gown and colorful earrings to amfAR.

51 of 235 RITA ORA Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock in a tiered feather mini dress with plumes on the sleeves, plus heart-embellished heels.

52 of 235 JESSICA HART Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock wears a Alexander Vauthier mini with a satement blue sash at the amfAR Gala.

53 of 235 IZABEL GOULART David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock has another head-turning, sheer gown moment in this heavily beaded Zuhair Murad gown worn to amfAR.

54 of 235 LARA STONE David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock has a Chanel moment in a sequin-and-feather belted mini and metallic heels at amfAR.

55 of 235 TWIN PEAKS REUNION Antony Jones/Getty Power couples unite! Director David Lynch and his wife Emily Stofle, join actor Kyle MacLachlan (dressed in a dapper Nigel Curtiss tuxedo) and his wife Desiree Gruber (wearing a gorgeous floral spotted Pronovias gown) at the Twin Peaks screening.

56 of 235 EVA LONGORIA Mike Marsland/WireImage The actress gives a whole lotta leg in a Balmain high-slit illusion gown at the L'Oréal Paris 20th anniversary gala. "What a dream come true to be the muse for a night of this man," she shared on Instagram of collaborating with Balmain's Olivier Rousteing on her look. "Thank you @olivier_rousteing for this amazing dress and for your even more amazing spirit!"

57 of 235 MARION COTILLARD Chris Jackson/Getty After stepping out in a slew of head-turning gowns, Cotillard selects a chic white canvas corset belted tunic top from Self-Portrait at the Annabel's and Chopard Party.

58 of 235 KATE UPTON Andreas Rentz/Getty Upton makes her Cannes 2017 debut in a timeless black satin gown with draped detailing, plus a chic updo and glowy makeup at the AMORE cocktail reception.

59 of 235 IRINA SHAYK Stephane Cardinale /Corbis/Getty It's hard to believe the model has a 9-week-old baby at home, considering she's already back to wearing completely sheer, underwear-baring dresses like this netted Balmain design at the L'Oréal Paris 20th anniversary gala.

60 of 235 ELLE FANNING Dave Benett/Getty/Focus Features/Universal Pictures After a parade of princess ball gown moments, the breakout style star of Cannes keeps it simple in a black midi, pumps and some diamonds for sparkle at a private after party for her film The Beguiled.

61 of 235 DIANE KRUGER Dave Benett/Getty/Focus Features/Universal Pictures The actress teams her shiny leather pants with a sparkling tunic and edgy buckle sandals at a private after party for The Beguiled.

62 of 235 PARIS HILTON Pascal Le Segretain/Getty The heiress' Cannes takeover continues in a sexy black lace Philipp Plein gown plus matching rose-embroidered over-the-knee boots at the L'Oréal Paris 20th anniversary gala.

63 of 235 KAROLINA KURKOVA Andreas Rentz/Getty The fringe on the model's colorful mod spotted mini matches her new bangs at the AMORE cocktail reception. She piles on the accessories in green lace-up sandals and a fringe bag.

64 of 235 NICOLE KIDMAN Antonio de Moraes Barros Filho/FilmMagic silver fringed sequined gown Michael Kors collection.

65 of 235 KIRSTEN DUNST James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock The actress plays with color in her periwinkle gown, dark blue earrings and bright red lip at The Beguiled premiere.

66 of 235 IRINA SHAYK James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock The new mom continues her post-baby Cannes fashion parade in a sheer, belted, second-skin, custom Balmain gown with sequin accents at the premiere of The Beguiled.

67 of 235 ELLE FANNING David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock The 19-year-old actress is yet again the belle of the ball in her Rodarte strapless purple tulle confection at the premiere of The Beguiled.

68 of 235 EVA LONGORIA Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock Longoria is totally the girl who wears the concert tee to the concert, showing her love for Philipp Plein in a black high-slit gown with a keyhole neckline at the designer's resort collection show. She adds Casadei heels, Damiani and Messika jewels and a red lip to complete the look.

69 of 235 ELISABETH MOSS Neilson Barnard/Getty Ruffles are one of the hottest trends in streetwear right now, and the actress proves they can also be black tie appropriate in her purple chiffon gown.

70 of 235 HAILEY BALDWIN David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock This high-low Ralph & Russo gown moment might be a personal best for Hailey, who clearly has strong ear lobes to support those giant diamond earrings she's wearing to The Beguiled premiere.

71 of 235 ELSA HOSK Neilson Barnard/Getty We would definitely cast the supermodel as Cinderella in the Disney reboot, as she brings all the princess vibes to The Beguiled screening in her icy blue ball gown.

72 of 235 TONI GARN Chris Jackson/Getty There are cutouts and then there are cutouts as the model proves in her asymmetrical cut away Galvan gown at The Beguiled premiere.

73 of 235 IZABEL GOULART Neilson Barnard/Getty The Brazilian bombshell goes full-on Beyoncé in this bejeweled naked Roberto Cavalli gown at the screening of The Beguiled.

74 of 235 MARIA BORGES Dominique Charriau/WireImage The model drops a Balmain bombshell on The Beguiled red carpet in her custom blush feathered gown.

75 of 235 JASMINE TOOKES Neilson Barnard/Getty The Victoria's Secret models have fully invaded Cannes and they know how to light the carpet on fire. Jasmine keeps things a little more covered up in an elegant Georges Chakra gown with a statement train, plus Boucheron at The Beguiled premiere.

76 of 235 DOUTZEN KROES David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock The supermodel sparkles from all angles in her long-sleeve silver embellished Balmain gown at The Beguiled premiere.

77 of 235 LARA STONE James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock Feathers and sequins are total Cannes style "dos" and the model's black custom Balmain gown at The Beguiled premiere is the perfect hybrid of both.

78 of 235 NICOLE KIDMAN Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock

79 of 235 ELLE FANNING Anthony Harvey/FilmMagic The actress plays up her white Alexander McQueen dress with embroidered sandals at The Beguiled photo call.

80 of 235 KIRSTEN DUNST Doug PetersPA Images/INSTARimages.com The actress is the epitome of très chic in her white eyelet lace Loewe midi and black ankle-strap sandals at The Beguiled premiere.

81 of 235 ELLE FANNING Dominique Charriau/WireImage The breakout style star of Cannes does it again in a Dior Haute Couture sage green tulle bustier dress with "Impressionist garden-effect feather embroidery," as described in a release by the label. She also wears a Dior Fine Jewelry "Cygne Blanc" ring in white gold, diamonds and ruby to the Cannes 70th anniversary celebration.

82 of 235 IRINA SHAYK Neilson Barnard/Getty She may have only given birth nine weeks ago, but the supermodel dares to bare in a sheer yellow gown with a thigh-high slit, plus Lorraine Schwartz jewelry at the Hikari screening.

83 of 235 NICOLE KIDMAN Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty Kidman cannes do no wrong in her colorful embroidered Armani Privé dress, choker and soft waves at the 70th anniversary celebration.

84 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The color queen does it again in a citrus colored Armani Privé halter gown with a head-turning train at the 70th anniversary celebration of the festival.

85 of 235 CHARLIZE THEORN Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty The Dior darling wears a Dior Haute Couture black tulle and lace dress accessorized with Chopard diamonds at the 70th anniversary celebration.

86 of 235 DIANE KRUGER Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty Also wearing Dior Haute Couture, the actress opts for the label's "Dior grey" lace tiered ball gown, teamed with a black Dior ribbon choker and a Dior astrological clutch at the 70th anniversary celebration. She also adds a diamond Chopard necklace to complete the look.

87 of 235 MARION COTILLARD Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty The star dazzles from all angels in a midnight blue, crystal-covered Armani Privé gown with a slit and V-neck line, plus a statement diamond Chopard collar necklace.

88 of 235 UMA THURMAN Joanne Davidson/SilverHub/REX/Shutterstock Pretty in pink! The actress makes as splash in a pale pink Prada gown accented with a feather detailed hemline while attending the 70th Anniversary Cannes red carpet event.

89 of 235 SALMA HAYEK Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock "Gucci, Gucci, Gucci, Gucci, rock it everywhere," is definitely Hayek's style mantra, as she proves once again at the 70th anniversary party in a colorful Gucci creation.

90 of 235 NAOMI CAMPBELL Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock What's better than being decked in Bulgari jewels? Not much. Just ask the supermodel who teams her bling with a feathered black Atelier Versace gown at the 70th anniversary party.

91 of 235 EVA LONGORIA Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty Another day, another Cannes carpet for Longoria who selects a long-sleeve Pamella Roland metallic beaded gown with sheer panels for the 70th anniversary event.

92 of 235 ASHLEY BENSON Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty The Pretty Little Liars star has a true Cannes style moment in a statement gown and double strand diamond necklace.

93 of 235 BARBARA PALVIN ALBERTO PIZZOLI/AFP/Getty The models joins the Armani Privé brigade in a embroidered black column gown teamed with lots of diamonds at the 70th anniversary event.

94 of 235 RITA ORA Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty The singer wears a gold embroidered gown with a halter neckline and split sleeves from Elie Saab Haute Couture at the 70th anniversary event.

95 of 235 TILDA SWINTON Pascal Le Segretain/Getty There are black jumpsuits and then there are black jumpsuits covered in crystal like Swinton's sparkling Chanel design, worn to the 70th anniversary Cannes event.

96 of 235 MISCHA BARTON Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty Also attending the 70th Anniversary of the Cannes Film Festival, Barton makes her mark in a plunging black dress teamed wtih satin slides and piled on accessories.

97 of 235 NICOLE KIDMAN Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock If you were looking for summer hair inspiration, the actress delivers with her messy side braid, accented with a black ribbon to match her ruffled Versace dress and ankle-strap Christian Louboutin heels at the Top of the Lake: China Girl photo call.

98 of 235 ELISABETH MOSS Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The star teams her navy Jonathan Simkhai dress with purple suede pumps for a pop of color at the Top of the Lake: China Girl photo call.

99 of 235 MARION COTILLARD Venturelli/WireImage The actress goes for tons of sparkle in a custom multicolor sequin pants-gown from Michael Halpern's latest fall collection. "Marion is such a phenomenal actress, so when the opportunity arose to dress her, it was just a dream," Halpern told Vogue. "Since it’s Cannes, we both wanted high glamour, and the sequined bustier and trousers combination seemed perfect. She’s incredible, humble, and, of course, gorgeous."

100 of 235 ELLE FANNING Jacopo Raule/Getty The princess of Cannes attends the Prada dinner in a head-to-toe look from the label including a strapless feathered dress, blush satin slides and a pink bag.

101 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN Jacopo Raule/Getty The actress loves wearing color and does it so well in this blue dress with allover beading, worn to the Fondazione Prada Private Dinner.

102 of 235 SALMA HAYEK James McCauley/Variety/REX/Shutterstock The actress goes for a lady-like pleated dress with a white bow collar, red lips and faux bangs at the Kering Talks: Women in Motion panel.

103 of 235 ROBIN WRIGHT Splash News Sometimes a blazer and slacks can be just as chic as a dress, as the House of Cards star proves in her separates teamed with leopard pumps at the Kering Talks: Women in Motion panel.

104 of 235 UMA THURMAN Dominique Charriau/WireImage Uma looks like an add for Cannes dressing in her airy white coat dress, red rope necklace, oversize shades and studded sandals.

105 of 235 SALMA HAYEK Zunino Celotto/Getty "Whoever is responsible for making pajamas a trend for street wear -- thank you," the actress shared on Instagram of the printed pink Gucci separates she wore to the Kering Women in motion Luncheon.

106 of 235 GWENDOLINE CHRISTIE AFP/Getty The actress dresses for the warm, breezy weather on the French Riviera in a floral Fendi midi at the Top of the Lake: China Girl premiere.

107 of 235 PAMELA ANDERSON Stephane Cardinale/Corbis via Getty The actress continues her elegant Cannes fashion moment in a white knit gown at the Harmonist Party.

108 of 235 CHARLIZE THERON Venturelli/WireImage The actress goes for lots of sparkle in a ivory Prada gown accented with an overlay of silver chain and crystal details, plus Chopard jewelry at the Chopard Trophy photo call.

109 of 235 SALMA HAYEK Venturelli/WireImage Sexy Salma! The actress takes a black suit up a notch (or 10) by adding a lacy bustier, plus a red lip and slicked back hair at the Chopard Trophy dinner.

110 of 235 IZABEL GOULART Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Also opting for a sexy black suit, the model skips the shirt completely under her jacket at the Chopard Trophy dinner.

111 of 235 ANDIE MACDOWELL Venturelli/WireImage The star adds some sparkle to her black cutout gown via Chopard bling at the jewelry brand's dinner.

112 of 235 NICOLE KIDMAN Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The actress continues her Cannes reign in a tea-length Calvin Klein by Appointment dress with a black bodice and full white tulle skirt, plus patent leather pumps and close to 100 carats of Harry Winston diamonds.

113 of 235 EVA LONGORIA David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock Sheer, beaded, floral-embellished gowns like this Marchesa design have become the Longoria's go-to for Cannes red carpets (seen here at the premiere of The Killing of a Sacred Deer.)

114 of 235 SARA SAMPAIO Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock "My final premiere in Cannes with this amazing dress," the model gushed on Instagram of her custom sheer Francesco Scognamiglio gown and Avakian jewelry worn with Gianvito Rossi heels at the screening of The Killing of a Sacred Deer.

115 of 235 JULIETTE BINOCHE Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The actress brings Balmain back to the red carpet in a scarlet off-the-shoulder gown teamed with oversize hoops at the The Killing Of A Sacred Deer screening.

116 of 235 JASMINE SANDERS The influencer makes her Cannes debut in a navy gown with a built-in bustier bodice plus statement collar necklaces at the screening of The Killing Of A Sacred Deer.

117 of 235 ANDIE MACDOWELL Gisela Schober/Getty The red carpet vet wears a Roberto Cavalli Couture black sheer gown embroidered with crystals, glass beads, black velvet tigers and flowers, plus Messika jewels at the premiere of The Killing of a Sacred Deer.

118 of 235 KRISTIN SCOTT THOMAS Gisela Schober/Getty Also bringing her style A-game on The Killing Of A Sacred Deer red carpet, the actress wows in a long-sleeve hot pink gown and statement danglers.

119 of 235 IZABEL GOULART The supermodel's white, strapless, crystal-covered gown (worn to the screening of The Killing of a Sacred Deer) is definitley better from the back.

120 of 235 JOURDAN DUNN Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The top model definitely got the sheer gown memo wearing a nude gown with a see-through skirt and sequin criss-cross bodice at the screening of The Killing of a Sacred Deer.

121 of 235 NICOLE KIDMAN Andreas Rentz/Getty In a voluminous green gown with a cool pattern by Christian Dior Couture and a green sandal at The Killing Of A Sacred Deer photo call.

122 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN PJB/SIPA/REX/Shutterstock The jury member wore a candy apple green crepe and silk coat dress by Dior, Piaget jewels and Giuseppe Zanotti sandals at the Kering Women in Motion Awards.

123 of 235 SALMA HAYEK James McCauley/Variety/REX/Shutterstock The fashion-loving star tested out a pink 'do, which matched the pink flowers on her black cap-sleeve Gucci gown with floral appliques, at the Kering Women in Motion Awards.

124 of 235 UMA THURMAN James McCauley/Variety/REX/Shutterstock The star chose a beaded white gown with a sweetheart neckline and feather detailing at the skirt by Atelier Versace for the Kering Women in Motion Awards.

125 of 235 ISABELLE HUPPERT James McCauley/Variety/REX/Shutterstock The actress wore a simple white long-sleeve V-neck gown with a thin black belt by Saint Laurent for the Kering Women in Motion Awards.

126 of 235 JULIETTE BINOCHE James McCauley/Variety/REX/Shutterstock In a pink and white gown by Gucci for the Kering Women in Motion Awards.

127 of 235 KENDALL JENNER Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The model wore a one-shoulder top that featured a superlong train and denim booty shorts from the Alexandre Vauthier Haute Couture collection and patent black Sergio Rossi pumps for the Fashion for Relieve event.

128 of 235 NAOMI CAMPBELL Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The supermodel wore a blush gown with a spiderweb-like intricate bodice by Atelier Versace for the Fashion For Relief fundraiser.

129 of 235 BELLA HADID Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The model chose a sheer nude strapless design with a sweetheart neckline by Roberto Cavalli Couture for the Fashion for Relief event.

130 of 235 SARA SAMPAIO Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The model wore a metallic black and silver Balmain gown with strappy black Giuseppe Zanotti sandals, Messika jewels and a sleek high ponytail for the Fashion for Relief fundraiser.

131 of 235 HEIDI KLUM Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The supermodel wore a babydoll style mini with strappy heels and a box clutch for the Fashion for Relief event.

132 of 235 QUEEN RANIA Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The Jordanian royal chose a white chiffon dress with a lace fishnet underskirt by Givenchy Haute Couture by Riccardo Tisci, which she paired with a silver beaded clutch and white satin pumps by the designer for the Fashion for Relief event.

133 of 235 JOURDAN DUNN David M Benett/Dave Benett/Getty The model showed off her figure in a white knit jumpsuit by Jonathan Simkhai, Messika jewels and Aquazzura sandals at the Fashion for Relief bash.

134 of 235 KATE MOSS David M Benett/Dave Benett/Getty in a see-through black gown with a drop waist at the Fashion for Relief gala.

135 of 235 NICOLE KIDMAN Canio Romaniello/SilverHub/REX/Shutterstock Nicole Kidman arrived at the How to Talk to Girls at Parties premiere in a metallic midi with a keyhole neckline and a tiered skirt by Rodarte, which she paired with bold Harry Winston diamond jewels and matching metallic strappy sandals by Christian Louboutin.

136 of 235 ELLE FANNING Manuele Mangiarotti/SilverHu/REX/Shutterstock The actress chose a Gucci gown with a floral hemline and a deep plunging neckline, which she topped off with Tiffany & Co. jewelry, for the premiere of How to Talk to Girls at Parties.

137 of 235 EMMA THOMPSON Canio Romaniello/SilverHub/REX/Shutterstock The icon went for a classic and comfortable look in a black tank, black pants a yellow jacket and cool accessories like yellow drop earrings and three-tone shoes in black, white and yellow for the premiere of The Meyerowitz Stories.

138 of 235 ANDIE MACDOWELL Canio Romaniello/SilverHub/REX/Shutterstock The actress chose a purple and black gown (with a thigh-high slit!) with an oversize shoulder detail by Roberto Cavalli Couture, matching purple earrings and black Giuseppe Zanotti pumps for The Meyerowitz Stories premiere.

139 of 235 MOLLY SIMS James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock In a feather and beaded embellished midi by Monique Lhuillier, champagne Nicholas Kirkwood sandals and a feathered clutch by Kate Spade New York for The Meyerowitz Stories premiere.

140 of 235 OLGA KURYLENKO James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock The former Bond Girl chose an Elie Saab cap-sleeve sheer gown with blue embroidery and Piaget earrings for The Meyerowitz Stories premiere.

141 of 235 MARY J. BLIGE James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock The soulful singer arrived at the premiere of The Meyerowitz Stories wearing a Reem Acra sheer and black long-sleeve gown, which she paired with a bold circle diamond pendant and oversize diamond cuff.

142 of 235 COCO ROCHA James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock The model was thinking pink for the premiere of The Meyerowitz Stories in a bubblegum-hued Georges Hobeika off-the-shoulder gown with a ruffled hem. A diamond choker and tennis bracelet, as well as Giuseppe Zanotti sandals, completed the look.

143 of 235 GRETA GERWIG James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock The indie darling chose a white lace Rodarte gown featuring black trimming and Monique Péan jewelry for the premiere of The Meyerowitz Stories.

144 of 235 EVA LONGORIA REX/Shutterstock The L'Oreal ambassador wore a white blouse and matching shorts by Genny, as well as nude two-strap sandals while at the Cannes Film Festival.

145 of 235 ELLE FANNING David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock In a peachy-pink mod mini with platform closed-toe heels at the photo call for How to Talk to Girls at Parties

146 of 235 ELISABETH MOSS James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock The actress chose a white floral Emilia Wickstead dress and cherry-hued platform heels for The Square photo call.

147 of 235 SALMA HAYEK David M Benett/Getty The actress wore a single-sleeve gown with a thigh-high slit and elaborate neck line as well as a foldover top-handle bag for Vanity Fair and HBO dinner.

148 of 235 JULIANNE MOORE David M Benett/Getty The actress chose a black sequin gown with multi-color feather sleeves by Chanel, Chopard jewelry, a black clutch and a sleek updo for the Vanity Fair and HBO dinner.

149 of 235 LILY COLLINS David M Benett/Getty In a sheer burgundy Prabal Gurung dress (with visible panty lines!) and crystal-encrusted Christian Louboutin pumps at the Vanity Fair and HBO dinner.

150 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN David M Benett/Getty The jury member picked a white gown with a plunging V neckline by Ralph Lauren and Piaget jewels for the Vanity Fair and HBO bash.

151 of 235 EVA LONGORIA David M Benett/Getty Eva Longoria chose a blush nude silk gown with sheer paneling by Kaufmanfranco for the Vanity Fair and HBO dinner.

152 of 235 KENDALL JENNER David M Benett/Getty The model chose a long-sleeve black mini with a ruffle skirt by Ronald van der Kemp, black pumps and white pearl hoops for the Vanity Fair and Chopard party.

153 of 235 UMA THURMAN David M Benett/Getty The actress chose a seafoam green lace gown with nude heels for the Vanity Fair and HBO dinner.

154 of 235 KOURTNEY KARDASHIAN David M Benett/Dave Benett/Getty In a sequin mini Blumarine slipdress with pink sandals at a dinner celebrating Wonders Of The Sea.

155 of 235 LINDSAY LOHAN Samir Hussein/Getty Lohan chose a two-piece red, white and black geometric patterned look with black mules for the Champagne Armand de Brignac 'Ace of Spades' and Three Six Zero Entertainment Cannes Film Festival Celebration.

156 of 235 OLGA KURYLENKO Matthias Nareyek/Getty The actress chose a belted black dress with a white abstract starprint on the front by Elie Saab and black heels for the Salty photo call. A windswept wavy down 'do gave the look an added boost of sex appeal.

157 of 235 TILDA SWINTON Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock In a blue midi dress with sheer sleeves and red heels (that have a heart strap!) — both by Schiaparelli — at the HFPA party.

158 of 235 LILY COLLINS Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock In a black drop-waist Miu Miu mini with crystal embellishment and a tie-front closure with a black satin clutch and black pumps at the HFPA Party.

159 of 235 ELIZABETH OLSEN Pascal Le Segretain/Getty In a sparkly pink Miu Miu gown with an illusion-yet-plunging neckline and organza flower detail and Chopard jewels at the premiere of The Square.

160 of 235 CARA DELEVINGNE PJB/SIPA/REX/Shutterstock The model chose a black high-low hem Moschino gown, a bold choker and a deep berry lip for the Magnum x Moschino party.

161 of 235 ELIZABETH OLSEN Buckner/Variety/REX/Shutterstock The actress wore a simple black long sleeve gown and finished the minimal look with a cherry lip and simple updo for the Wind River party.

162 of 235 ELIZABETH OLSEN James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock The actress chose a black and tan geometric-printed midi by Marc Jacobs, black Nicholas Kirkwood sandals, Monica Vinander jewelry and a wavy down 'do for the Wind River photo call.

163 of 235 KENDALL JENNER Alberto Terenghi/Cannes/IPA/REX/Shutterstock Kendall Jenner stole the show in a flowing Giambattista Valli Couture minidress — as well as Chopard jewelry, Wolford socks and strappy sandals — at the premiere of 120 Beats Per Minute on Saturday.

164 of 235 KRISTEN STEWART Venturelli/WireImage Kristen Stewart wore a Chanel two-piece dress at the premiere of 120 Beats Per Minute on Saturday.

165 of 235 LIYA KEDEBE George Pimentel/WireImage Liya Kedebe wore a stunning gold frock by Paco Rabanne and Stella Luna sandals at the premiere of 120 Beats Per Minute on Saturday.

166 of 235 SARA SAMPAIO David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock Sara Sampaio traded the traditional gown for a pantsuit while attending the premiere of 120 Beats Per Minute on Saturday.

167 of 235 PETRA NEMCOVA George Pimentel/WireImage Petra Nemcova went for a glamorous blue Cristina Ottaviano look and Chopard jewelry at the premiere of 120 Beats Per Minute on Saturday.

168 of 235 ELISABETH MOSS Dominique Charriau/WireImage Elisabeth Moss paired a white Oscar de la Renta dress with a black leather jacket, which she paired with Chopard jewels and heels at the premiere of The Square on Saturday.

169 of 235 KENDALL JENNER Antonio de Moraes Barros Filho/FilmMagic The supermodel changed out of her sheer knit fancy pants and into a structured Ralph & Russo Couture column with sheer side panels and a Chopard necklace featuring 59.38 carats of sapphires and matching earrings for the Chopard Space party.

170 of 235 RIHANNA Pascal Le Segretain/Getty In a

171 of 235 ADRIANA LIMA Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images for Chopard The always-sexy supermodel went for a more demure, covered-up look in a black gown with split sleeves and an embroidered crystal bodice at the Chopard Space Party. She topped off the look with Chopard earrings featuring over 30 carats of diamonds.

172 of 235 PETRA NEMCOVA The model chose a glimmering one-shoulder design with a thigh-high slit, which she paired with silver strappy sandals and a gold clutch for the Chopard Space bash.

173 of 235 SARA SAMPAIO The model picked a sheer long-sleeve black gown and accessorized with 31 carat diamond Chopard earrings for the Chopard Space party. She vamped up the look with a bold burgundy lip.

174 of 235 ISABELLE HUPPERT The star, 64, dazzled in a marigold gown with a sheer top and gorgeous drop Chopard earrings at the Chopard Space party.

175 of 235 ISABELI FONTANA The model rocked a star-print jumpsuit and a simple diamond Chopard choker made with over 19 carats of sapphires at the Chopard Space party.

176 of 235 WINNIE HARLOW The model accessorized her cherry red Zuhair Murad ballgown with a dazzling diamond Chopard necklace featuring a 52.76 carat pear-shaped emerald at the Chopard Space party.

177 of 235 EVA LONGORIA The petite star showed off her love of gorgeous gowns in a white strapless design that featured dramatic draping and embellishment at the waist when she attended the Global Gift Gala.

178 of 235 TILDA SWINTON Gisela Schober/Getty The star always makes style waves, this time turning heads in a long-sleeve white gown and an impressively high hairstyle at the premiere of Okja.

179 of 235 RIHANNA Dominique Charriau/WireImage Everyone else can go home: Rihanna wins the carpet in a Dior Haute Couture off-white silk taffeta coat and bustier dress, plus Andy Wolf Eyewear custom white angular "Ojala" sunglasses and layers of Chopard diamonds at the Okja screening.

180 of 235 BELLA HADID Also dressed in Dior Haute Couture, Bella Hadid attends the Okja premiere in a red silk satin quilted dress, plus Bulgari's iconic Serpenti High Jewelry diamond necklace and stacked bracelets.

181 of 235 Aishwarya Rai Bachchan The actress goes full Cinderella in a full-skirted periwinkle ballgown at the Okja premiere.

182 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN Venturelli/WireImage The Cannes jury member wears a lilac embellished gown with a fringe skirt at the Okja premiere.

183 of 235 LILY COLLINS Stephane Cardinale /Corbis/ Getty Collins does Cannes! The actress dazzles in a Ralph and Russo Couture gown and Bulgari jewels at the Okja premiere.

184 of 235 CARA DELEVINGNE Anthony Harvey/FilmMagic The star gives her best supermodel smize in an asymmetrical LBD teamed with a silver collar necklace, tons of rings and a deep purple lip at the Magnum party.

185 of 235 LILY COLLINS Mike Marsland/WireImage Her separates game is strong. Collins teams an ivory sequin pencil skirt with a striped one-shoulder top (both Johanna Ortiz) at the Okja photo call.

186 of 235 TILDA SWINTON Ki Price/Getty Tilda takes on suiting (and wins) in a green Haider Ackermann two-piece at the Okja photo call.

187 of 235 JULIANNE MOORE Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Everyone is a Rihanna fan! Moore fêtes the singer at the Rihanna x Chopard Collection dinner (and she wears some dazzling Chopard danglers for the occasion.)

188 of 235 WINNIE HARLOW Pascal Le Segretain/Getty After her princess moment at the Loveless premiere, the model dares to bare in a cutout black gown at the Rihanna X Chopard Collection dinner.

189 of 235 ISABELLE HUPPERT Vittorio Zunino Celotto/Getty The French actress looks timeless and effortlessly cool in her black separates, oversize sunglasses and plum lipstick at the Kering Talks Women In Motion event.

190 of 235 DAISY LOWE Anthony Harvey/FilmMagic The model follows in Cara's footsteps, also wearing an LBD to the Magnum party. She adds a diamond necklace and metallic accessories to take her look into Cannes territory.

191 of 235 RIHANNA Pascal Le Segretain/Getty They say you're never fully dressed without a smile, but when you're Rihanna, you're never fully dressed without millions of dollars of Chopard diamonds, which the superstar wears with a voluminous black tulle gown at the Rihanna x Chopard Collection party.

192 of 235 SUSAN SARANDON George Pimentel/WireImage After flaunting her cleavage in an emerald green velvet gown on opening night, the 70-year-old actress covers up a little bit more in a white button-down, leather maxi skirt, blazer and chic sunglasses

193 of 235 EMILY RATAJKOWSKI Stephane Cardinale Corbis/Getty The model and actress cannes pull off just about anything. She hits the Loveless premiere in a bespoke black lace jumpsuit-gown hybrid by Peter Dundas.

194 of 235 ROBIN WRIGHT WireImage (2); REX/Shutterstock Better from the back? The 51-year-old actress serves some serious sex appeal from all angles in her satin backless slip gown (worn to the Loveless premiere), teamed with platform sandals and a blue velvet Hayward clutch.

195 of 235 ADRIANA LIMA Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock White hot! The model flaunts her professional posing skills in a strapless Naeem Khan gown and statement diamond necklace at the Loveless premiere.

196 of 235 WINNIE HARLOW Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty Go big, or go home seems to be the model's Cannes dressing motto, as she proves in this electric blue ball gown at the Loveless premiere.

197 of 235 PETRA NEMCOVA Gisela Schober/Getty In case you forgot how amazing Nemcova's leg muscles are, here's a reminder. The model made her mark at the Loveless premiere in a 2nd Skin Co. gown featuring a slit-up-to-you-know-where and Loriblu matte leather sandals.

198 of 235 LILY DONALDSON George Pimentel/WireImage The model looks like a prima ballerina at the Loveless premiere in her ephemeral Dior design featuring a sheer tulle skirt and illusion neckline.

199 of 235 AMBER VALLETTA George Pimentel/WireImage The model and actress skips the floor-skimming gown in favor of a asymmetrical tiered dress with a floral pattern, plus embellished heels and a statement choker.

200 of 235 DEEPIKA PADUKONE VALERY HACHE/AFP/Getty Bringing another major cape moment, the actress coordinates in head-to-toe emerald green (from her eye shadow to her heels!) at the Loveless premiere.

201 of 235 LILY-ROSE DEPP GUILLAUME COLLET/SIPA/REX/Shutterstock Flats may be banned from the Cannes carpet, but you can definitley wear sneakers on the streets of the French Riviera as the teen trendsetter proves pairing her orange mini with a pair of blue trainers.

202 of 235 ELLE FANNING Christophe Geyres/ABACA/INSTARimages.com The new L'Oréal Paris ambassador tries out some bright lip shades from the brand.

203 of 235 MICHELLE WILLIAMS Samir Hussein/WireImage LV love! The Louis Vuitton muse reps the brand once again in a custom velvet gown embroidered with crystals, plus Louis Vuitton satin sandals and a Louis Vuitton cocktail ring.

204 of 235 JULIANNE MOORE George Pimentel/WireImage Moore looks at home on the Palais de Festivals steps in a white feather-and-sequin design, Chopard earrings and silver strappy sandals.

205 of 235 CARA DELEVINGNE Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock *Goes to France once, wears a beret.* At the Magnum x Moschino photo call, the star covers her buzz cut with a red "Anarchy" beret, teamed with a black zip-front dress, black pumps, a red lip and blue aviators.

206 of 235 MARION COTILLARD Marking her third outfit in less than 12 hours, the actress continues her post-baby red carpet parade in a tan embroidered mini dress and clear sandals.

207 of 235 EMILY RATAJKOWSKI Gisela Schober/GC Images The model gives off all the vacation vibes in her floral patchwork maxi, powder blue slide sandals and straw handbag.

208 of 235 ARAYA HARGATE Stephane Cardinale/Corbis/Getty The Thai actress's maternity style set the red carpet on fire! She had the best dressed bump in Cannes, wearing a custom Ralph & Russo Couture dress teamed with a matching silk cape covered in crystals and ostrich feathers, and some major jewelry.

209 of 235 JULIANNE MOORE Moore plays up her red hair in an emerald Sonia Rykiel dress for the Wonderstruck photo call.

210 of 235 UMA THURMAN After going full-out bombshell in a cleavage-baring Versace gown, Uma keeps things more conservative at a photo call in black pants, a camel blazer, scarf and blue suede pumps.

211 of 235 MICHELLE WILLIAMS The actress remains loyal to Louis Vuitton in a A-line mini featuring a wave and floral print at the Wonderstruck photo call.

212 of 235 JULIANNE MOORE Another style highlight for Moore! The star's style parade shows no signs of slowing down, seen here in a icy blue embellished dress and silver sandals worn to an after party.

213 of 235 BELLA HADID David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock The model gave us a peek inside her glam session before hitting the red carpet at the opening ceremony, and her big outfit reveal was definitely worth the wait. She shows some serious leg (her signature Cannes style move) in a strapless blush satin Alexandre Vauthier gown teamed with a Bulgari necklace featuring a 180-carat sapphire. (Not pictured: The bodyguard that's probably following her around to protect that necklace.)

214 of 235 JULIANNE MOORE Joanne Davidson/SilverHub/REX/Shutterstock The Cannes vet goes for true Hollywood glamour at the opening ceremony in a scarlet feather-trim Givenchy Haute Couture gown with illusion detailing on the neckline and floral embroidery, plus Chopard earrings featuring Gemfields ethically sourced Mozambican rubies.

215 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN Pascal Le Segretain/Getty If we were judging the Cannes juror's strapless embroidered Alexander McQueen gown (worn to the opening ceremony), we'd definitely give it five stars. She accessorizes with a ruby-and-diamond necklace and bold red lip.

216 of 235 ELLE FANNING James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock Is it too early to crown Fanning the princess of Cannes? The actress has a full-on Cinderella moment in a strapless satin Vivienne Westwood Couture ball gown with a voluminous train.

217 of 235 UMA THURMAN Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The actress shows she has her PhD in Cannes dressing in a pink, pleated off-the-shoulder Atelier Versace gown, and Bulgari jewelry, including a diamond Serpenti necklace, a matching bracelet and diamond stud earrings.

218 of 235 MARION COTILLARD Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The actress stands alongside her co-stars at the Ismael's Ghosts premiere in a strapless black lace-up gown and Chopard jewelry.

219 of 235 DEEPIKA PADUKONE Gisela Schober/Getty The Indian actress glows in an eggplant-colored Marchesa gown teamed with a bold lip and drop earrings at the Ismael's Ghosts premiere.

220 of 235 EMILY RATAJKOWSKI Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock After modeling her layers of Bulgari necklaces completely naked, the model hits the red carpet in a pink satin custom Twinset slip gown with a thigh-high slit, plus strappy sandals and faux bangs.

221 of 235 HAILEY BALDWIN Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock Purple reign! The model makes her mark on Cannes in a vibrant peplum Twinset gown and diamond drop earrings.

222 of 235 SARA SAMPAIO Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock Talk about a grand entrance. Sampaio's low-cut, red, beaded Zuhair Murad Couture ball gown gives high-fashion glamour from every angle. (And all those Chopard diamonds help too.)

223 of 235 SUSAN SARANDON James Gourley/REX/Shutterstock Velvet wouldn't be our first choice of fabric in the French Riviera, but there is no denying the actress looks totally cool in her forest green gown featuring a major slit and low neckline. She completes the look with her go-to shades and Stella Luna sling-back pumps.

224 of 235 MONICA BELLUCCI The actress opens Cannes as the master of ceremonies in a voluminous black tulle Dior Couture gown featuring a sheer skirt and low-neckline, plus a statement diamond pendant necklace.

225 of 235 EVA HERZIGOVÁ She's still got. The 44-year-old supermodel shows off her posing skills in a gold, high-slit gown.

226 of 235 NAOMIE HARRIS David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock Rainbow bright! The star's multicolor tulle Gucci gown, teamed with a layered diamond necklace, definitely stands out on the carpet.

227 of 235 FAN BINGBING Venturelli/WireImage The star proves capes are a Cannes style must in her elegant Elie Saab Couture gown.

228 of 235 ROBIN WRIGHT Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The star skips the floor-sweeping gowns in favor of a sparkly, long-sleeve Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello mini, Chopard jewelry and classic pumps.

229 of 235 LILY-ROSE DEPP Matt Baron/BEI/Shutterstock The 17-year-old model and actress gives off goddess vibes in her white cutout gown with gold embellishments.

230 of 235 JESSICA CHASTAIN Andreas Rentz/Getty When you're on the official Cannes Film Festival jury, you need to stand out. Chastain clearly got the memo at the jury photo call, dressed to impress in a low-cut red jumpsuit, gold sandals and a matching red mani/pedi combo.

231 of 235 MARION COTILLARD David Boyer/ABACA/INSTARimages.com The actress selectes a shirt dress with side lace-up slit detail, layered over triple-cuff jeans and camel ankle spiral strap sandals (all from Y/PROJECT) at a photo call for Ismael's Ghost.

232 of 235 MONICA BELLUCCI Splash News Online Also skipping a dress in favor of a chic onesie, Bellucci looks effortlessly cool in a black jumpsuit at the Mistress of Ceremonies photo call.

233 of 235 BELLA HADID AND HAILEY BALDWIN WENN.com The models have landed! The duo keeps things somewhat demure in their coordinating white boating outfits.

234 of 235 ELLE FANNING Splash News Online One of Fanning's first tasks? Dipping her toes in the Mediterranean! The actress poses in a blue pleated dress and red sunnies.
authors: Beauty Coverage Across The Brand'S Platforms. This Includes Managing The Vertical'S Tentpoles
Running Lead On The Met Gala
title: Best Dressed Stars on Cannes Red Carpet 2017

meta_data.description: See all the gowns, glitz and glamour on the Cannes red carpet at PEOPLE
meta_data.sailthru.author: Brittany Talarico
meta_data.parsely-tags: Entertainment,Beauty & Style,Celebrity,Person,Awards Shows and Events,Red Carpet Style,Cannes Film Festival,Jessica Chastain,Monica Bellucci,The Scoop

og.title: The Best Fashion at the Cannes Film Festival, Including Best Actress Winner Diane Kruger!
og.description: See all the gowns, glitz and glamour on the Cannes red carpet at PEOPLE

twitter.title: The Best Fashion at the Cannes Film Festival, Including Best Actress Winner Diane Kruger!
twitter.description: See all the gowns, glitz and glamour on the Cannes red carpet at PEOPLE
